title: In Case You Missed It: Personal Finance 101 : 1A - NPR
content: In Case You Missed It: Personal Finance 101 : 1A  NPR
description: If you could put a grade on your financial wellness, what would it be? When we asked you earlier this year about what you wished you learned in school, many of you said personal finance. And you're not alone: in states across the country, dozens of personal finance education bills are pending. But what makes for an effective financial education course? And how prepared are Americans to take on their own finances? Want to support 1A? Give to your local public radio station and subscribe to this podcast. Have questions? Find us on Twitter @1A.
